synopsis.text: Mogu Mogu Munya Munya, the latest anime adaptation from the beloved Parappa the Rapper video game franchise, is set to delight audiences with its charming focus on the endearing character, PJ Berri. Fuji TV will broadcast this series of shorts, each episode spanning a concise yet entertaining 96 seconds. The anime not only commemorates two significant milestones - the 20th anniversary of the game and the 15th anniversary of the anime series - but also promises to bring back nostalgic memories while attracting new fans. The pilot episode is scheduled to air in August 2016, followed by the full series in Fall 2016. This exciting new take on a classic character is sure to captivate viewers and leave them eager for more.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
